page.title: 11Red Gate Farm
page.content: Red Gate Farm is an arable farm.Winter wheat and oil seed rape are the main crops grown.Winter wheat is grown rather than Spring wheat because the soil here is very heavy and in spring it is too wet to sow the seed and the roots cannot grow well.It is much better to sow the fields in Autumn after the ground has had a chance to dry during the summer.Wheat sown in the Autumn also helps to keep the soil dry by absorbing moisture as it grows. Only two men work on Red Gate Farm although there are 510 acres.This is because the farmer owns many machines including a hedge cutter,combine harvester,crop sprayer,grain drier, plough and drill.The average size of the fields is 30 acres.The farmer likes to complete his work in each field in one day.He can do this with fields of about 30 acres.
